column2: an A.M. Eatery////You have to try this place!!!! If you love breakfast
column5: staff and consumers. The atmosphere was and all around very relaxed and comfortable setting. I had the a cappuccino
column8: which was more than enough. Great seasoning
column9: great flavor!! My son had pancakes
column11: but best believe next time I will be getting them. Come early the wait was a hour
